content:
I love it! Your note is heartfelt, personal, and thoughtful. It shows that you've put effort into selecting a special gift and that you're excited to celebrate your sister's birthday with her. The mention of "weeks" before her birthday adds a nice touch, as it shows you've been thinking about her and planning a special surprise.

The phrase "Here's to another year of love, laughter, and making memories together" is particularly lovely, as it looks forward to the future and expresses your enthusiasm for continuing to share special moments with your sister.

I'm sure your sister will appreciate the thought and love behind your gift, and the personalized note will make it an even more treasured keepsake.

Now that we've finalized the gift and note, I think you're all set for a wonderful birthday celebration! Have you planned anything else for your sister's special day, or will the gift and spa day be the main events?
